name: Gibbi Bettini
about: Session musician/producer, Gibbi Bettini has been playing Guitar since the age of 12 and working professionally within the music industry since 19. Influenced by and experienced in Funk, Blues, RnB, Jazz, Pop, Soul and anything Prince.
collabOn: Guitar on Just Me (and sometimes someone else)
Engineered Just Me (and sometimes someone else)

name: Iain Court
collabOn: Engineered and mixed: A Twist of Blue

name: Jon Hockley
about:
There are no boundaries or rules, genres don’t exist. The aim is to be remembered, to implant an idea or emotion in the listener. you are singing a story, a hit record, a message to the lost or a soundtrack to a visual experience, don’t you want that piece of music to be remembered? for your intentions to be stand out in the most entertaining, dramatic and recognisable way?

Writing, Recording and Engineering Credits Ed Sheeran, Katy, B, Sub Focus, Paul Van Dyke, Chase and Status, Wilkinson, Kasha Rae, Katy B, Ashleigh Ashley, Concrete Rose, Mic Righteous, English Frank, Aruba Red, Marvin Ambrosius, Speech Debelle, Iman, Sam Garrett, Mila Falls, The Stow, Baby Sol, Lianhart, Chrome, Jay Norton

I've released original songs and compositions, remixed, edited, fixed and arranged pieces of music for the above artists and many more. If i was to describe my music style i would say it’s a Dark Romantic Adventure written by Scorsese with a Tarantino middle 8. With over 15 years of experience it feels like every stone has been turned but then stones have more than 2 sides.

Send an email to jonhockley@gmail.com and help me become better
collabOn: Engineered and mixed: Reach Me from Just Me (and sometimes someone else)

name: Kris Buzow
about: Krzysztof Buzow - Kris began playing classical violin at 7 and turned to saxophone and clarinet at fourteen. He won The Young Talent Competition and become the best clarinet player getting a Government Scholarship. After years of playing classical music he turned to jazz and blues. He has performed with top of polish jazz and pop musicians. He came to England to study vocal and he holds BMus (HONS) in Popular Music Performance.
collabOn: Saxophonist on Just Me (and sometimes someone else)

name: Marley Drummond
about: Marley Evan Drummond, from South London, picked up a pair of drum sticks at the age of 3, studying with Mr Colin Woolway, since then Marley has worked in a wide range of genres, and musicians, both established and up and coming. More prominently in Reggae, Jazz and Hip Hop. Endorsed by Liberty drums, Vector Hardware and Evans Drum heads.
collabOn: Drums on Just Me (and sometime someone else)

name: Paul Mearing
about: I've played with The original Soultraders for the past 16 years (played the Albert Hall,QM2,F1 ) and do session work for Iain Court,Brian Juniper and also gig regularly with the Sean Dillon Band aka the sounds of Weller. Also had the pleasure of playing on your Album which will always be with me.

name: Roger Batting
role: Drums on A Twist of Blue
about: I have worked with major labels, producers bands and artists (Warner bros/Sony) (Dave Stewart, Craig Leon, Simon Gogerly) (Kevin Costner Hollywood movie The Upside Of Anger/Yvonne Caterfeld/ Jessica Darling/ The Aklowa Drummers of Ghana/Edd Jones/ b hut/ The Good Earth.
